record.description: Mandolin, Banjo, and Guitar, 1895: Officers, Anna Wilmarth (president) and Inez Hopkins (secretary-treasurer). Mandolins: Laura Graves, Theodosia Kane, Sarah Tunnecliffe, Edith Schwarz, Sarah Munson, Inez Hopkins, Anna Wilmarth, and Charlotte Capen. Banjos: Adelaide Ide and Jeanette Kennedy. Guitars: Jessie Nelson, Eva Graves, and Marian Morgan.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
